metadata.dc:author: García Paños, J M
Sampietro Crespo, A
Olle Carreras, J
Jiménez Leiro, J F
Bolaño, N
metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVE A case of spontaneous perirenal hematoma in pelvic kidney in an HIV(+) patient is described. METHODS The literature on the etiology of spontaneous perirenal hematoma in pelvic kidney is reviewed, with special reference to the three cases reported in HIV(+) patients. RESULTS/CONCLUSION The patient presented none of the features described in the literature. The "watchful waiting" approach was adopted and the outcome was favourable.
metadata.dc:title: Hematoma espontáneo perirrenal en enfermo VIH(+) sobre riñón pélvico.
[Perirenal spontaneous hematoma in HIV(+)-patient in pelvic kidney].
